name: The War over a Melon Field (Spring Spring)
name_original: The War over a Melon Field (Spring Spring)
description:
This is just a nice little fun and simple game that plays well in short sessions and is very easy to figure out. It's also completely linear, so in many ways it is the total opposite of any other game I've made, but this is the one time where defying the customs worked really well!

You select between three familiar (at least to anyone familiar with my universe) characters and race around collecting melons before the birds get them! It's as simple as it gets. Don't ask me how the physics of your actual vehicle work, however, because I have no idea.

Originally this was made for the OGA Summer Game Jam of 2019, where it won first place.

The cover art was drawn by Dracofaun.
